page.title: 01GAZETTEER
page.content: : Our area is part of the south coast. It is mainly residential,half of our 'D'block is sea and half is land. Our block is quite old, most of the houses date from the early 20th century and some are even 400 years old. Much of the landscape has been used for defence, for example Fort Gilkicker, Fort Monckton, Spitsand Fort. All these were used to protect Gosport and Portsmouth Harbour. Now they are used (apart from Spitsand) by the Ministry of Defence. Included in the western edge of our 'D' block is Alverstoke,now a popular residential area, but was more important in the past. We also have a small corner of Portsmouth,which includes Southsea Common.
